reviewText: Obviously if you want a sensuous, candlelit massage tape, you should be looking at Playboy...but if you want a massage that intertwines your yoga practice and your relationship with your significant other, then you may find this to be a rare discovery. We really prefer Mark's new Progressive Power Yoga series, but working out with Mark is an experience that my wife and I have shared on many an occasion. Either way, Mark is an outstanding teacher, incredibly motivating and decidedly one of a kind.
